title: 115_hr3727
content: Increasing Telehealth Access in Medicare Act or the ITAM Act This bill allows Medicare Advantage organizations to include additional telehealth services as basic benefitsnbsp. In their annual bids beginning in plan year 2020. The bill also permits payment under Medicare for chronic care management servicesnbsp, that usenbsp. Specified telecommunication technologies. The bill increases funding available to the Medicare Improvement Fund.
